name: Moving On
description:
Gamejam game made for Manifest 2019 at Columbia College Chicago.

The gamejam themes were amplify and empathy. We chose to make a simple narrative theme that revolved around Max, who is meeting his friend after a long time. 

Credits:

Project lead: Ishan Dutta

Programmers: Scott Little, Jethro Schoppenhorst

Game Designers: Daniel Dabaneh, Ishan Dutta, J

Art: J
